title: No Accident
lyrics:
Yah
Ay, yah
I'm sayin, shit crazy
Tables turned, know what I'm sayin'
(?) Bel-Air
I'm up now, know what I'm sayin'

I don't want no features from you lame ass rappers

(?) mumble (?)

This shit my own

Ya



I don't shoot on accident

Pull up with that Mac and shit

I rock Gucci, Raf and shit

My bitch boo, she baddest bitch

Step my paper up like bricks

I stayed down for all this shit

I can't go out like no bitch

I ain't goin' up like Mitch

All my niggas rock for me

Try your luck with robbin' me

Keep a Glock, a .223

Bitch you had a whole thing

I ain't serve no bricks for bubbly

Nigga, that's what my name mean

Boy, your name don't hold no weight

Ain't see your ass up in the streets



If a nigga don't know my name

He probably on the same thing

No face, no case

I don't know you, don't speak

Most these niggas crash dummy, they just wanna be seen

Send lil' buddy on a mission, I'mma make 'em slide for free

I be stackin' up this paper, make 'em play Monopoly

I ain't worried 'bout these bitches, but these bitches jockin' me

Girl, it's been a long day, ge-get on top of me

She gon' fuck and she gon' suck, I bust a nut, it's time to leave

I ain't nothin' like these niggas, honestly, I'm too street

Still stickin' to the code, I guess it's just me

I rock Ksubi, Raf Simons, my designer OD

I was juggin' out the trenches, made a hundred on our street



I don't shoot on accident

Pull up with that Mac and shit

I rock Gucci, Raf and shit

My bitch boo, she baddest bitch

Step my paper up like bricks

I stayed down for all this shit

I can't go out like no bitch

I ain't goin' up like Mitch

All my niggas rock for me

Try your luck with robbin' me

Keep a Glock, a .223

Bitch you had a whole thing

I ain't serve no bricks for bubbly

Nigga, that's what my name mean

Boy, your name don't hold no weight

Ain't see your ass up in the streets



In the streets, nigga

Up in the streets, nigga

This shit a ocean, man this shit can get deep, nigga

My homies solid, I can't hang around no weak niggas

Shit get ugly, niggas turn into police niggas

I'm a beast nigga (rawr)

I'mma eat niggas (ya)

To be a boss, you gotta get it by any means, nigga (get it by any means)

I hit the block soon as I turned 15, nigga (turned 15)

I done did some shit that you prolly won't believe, nigga



Y'all niggas be on cappin' shit

Y'all niggas be on rapper shit

I can't even fuck with

I stay back from all this shit

I stay back from all these bitches

Money so long, money so long

I don't shoot on accident

I can't go out like no bitch

I stay down for all the ritches

Nigga I don't want no features



Bans

Ain't no love, nigga
